snippet: A group has taken steps to become the first officially recognized marijuana-growing club in Uruguay, where lawmakers have made their country the world's first national marketplace for legal pot....

headline.print_headline: Uruguay's First Marijuana Club Seeks Recognition
headline.main: Uruguay's First Marijuana Club Seeks Recognition

lead_paragraph: A group has taken steps to become the first officially recognized marijuana-growing club in Uruguay, where lawmakers have made their country the world's first national marketplace for legal pot.
